name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (PFTC Games)
description: With the help of Udemy, I have created my first "game". It is a basic game that uses basic C#. There is really nothing to it, just an anagram game. I have placed a few easter eggs in there.  This is just the beginning, I will be learning coding so PFTC Games can bring more developed games. I am just starting out so it will take some time, especially tryingto get it done with 3 little kids running around my house. Have fun people.
